itemDescription: English theologian and Bishop of St Albans (1980–1995)

wikipedia_page.main: John Bernard Taylor (6 May 1929 – 1 June 2016) was a British bishop and theologian who served as Bishop of St Albans.

response: *  1929   – John Taylor, English bishop and theologian (d. 2016)
